Builder.Entities: structures/cart_wallset_short structures/{civ}_catapult structures/cart_embassy_celtic structures/cart_embassy_iberian structures/cart_embassy_italiote structures/{civ}_wonder

Identity.History: Probably kin of the Berbers, the Mauritanians are said to have supplied good archers to the armies of Carthage. The Romans similarly hired and appreciated Mauritanian archery skills after they subjugated Carthage and gained nominal control of North Africa.
